Back to Karol Szymanowski

Karol Szymanowski

Polish Songs

1925–1926 · Michałowski 61

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 13' 30"

  • 9. Idzie żołnierz borem, lasem
  • 10. Tam na błoniu błyszczy kwiecie
  • 12. Jak to na wojence ładnie
  • 14. Leci liście z drzewa
  • 15. Hej, strzelcy, wraz
  • 16. Ułani, ułani, malowane dzieci
  • 17. O mój rozmarynie
  • 18. I zabujały siwe łabędzie
  • 19. Gdzież to jedziesz, Jasiu

This is a collection of settings of songs by Szymanowski, who wrote nine out of the total twenty, and his brother, Feliks, who wrote the other eleven. There is no separate vocal line: the score is for solo piano with accompanying text only, with the melody being simply the upper voice of the piano. Although intended to be performed with voice, the songs can be played by solo piano.

Recommended editions

  • Complete Edition (PWM) · C 11 · PWM 8094 · Songs for Voice and Piano II · ed. Adam Neuer
